function-usage.testenviron: In order to try out the examples, start a command shell and move to folder $FOXPATH/examples-functions/write-doc.

example.description: Write selected documents into a folder. The written files are indented.
Write selected documents into a folder, do not indet.

example.tag: Modify documents and write the results.
example.description: Modifies documents and writes the results into a folder

Writes a document fragment. The file name of the fragment is the file name of the containing document. Use functions write-named-doc, write-renamed-doc, write-exnamed-doc in order to write to a different file name.
